Simon Cowell was asked if his former`` Idol'' judging partner href="http://people.zap2it.com/p/Paula Abdul-Paula Abdul/68870"> Paula Abdul could possibly turn up as a judge on`` X Factor.'' I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul . We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet. It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers.
